item.title: FX Market Integration Specialist (redwood shores)
item.description:
Description:
Fortex, Inc. (www.Fortex.com) is an industry leading provider of real-time, mission-critical financial trading and exchange systems. Currently, the Fortex FX system handles up to $12 billions daily currency transactions and over 5 millions tickets a month with top 10 global market making banks. We are launching into a rapid growth phase. If you thrive on a fast-paced dynamic environment and want to make a significant impact on a pioneering product, this unique opportunity may be just right for you.

Experience:
- 3+ years experience in developing Windows VC++ programs for a commercial product.
- Extensive experience in FIX implementation in financial markets
- Java programming skill a plus
- Experience with OOP and design patterns.

Job Description:
- Develop FX order routing/market data interface with various global banks and FX ECN
- Develop API and FIX gateway to support hedge funds/broker-dealers algorithmic trading through our Multibank Portal
- Support API integration
- Enhanced equities/options/futures order routing and market data engines in FIX and in other protocols with all major exchanges and ECN

To apply for this position, send your resume and cover letter to careers@Fortex.com with "Market Integration Specialist" in the subject line. You may also apply for the same position in our New York office.
